  • Uses of Item in items

    Subclasses of Item in items
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CritPotion
    Item that can be used on a monster to increase their crit rate by the given crit amount.
    class 
    DamagePotion
    Item that can be used on a monster to increase their damage by the given damage amount.
    class 
    HealthPotion
    Item that can be used on a monster to heal them for the given heal amount.
    class 
    LevelPotion
    Item that can be used on a monster to level them up to increase their stats.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
